Name: Azurian Weapon

Actions.Name: Torpedo
Actions.Description: The Weapon summons a burrowing torpedo in a free space in range 6.

Summons.Name: Torpedo
Summons.Effects: At the start of the weapon's next turn, the torpedo submerges, burrows, and detonates under the closest foe for a blast 1 area effect, destroying it. Foes in the area must save or take [D]+[fray], or [fray] damage on a successful save. Then, create a pit in the area. The torpedo deactivates if destroyed early.

Actions.Name: Heavy Arkentech Mine
Actions.Description: The Weapon places a mine in a free space in range 6 not adjacent to any character. The mine is a 1 space terrain effect. If any character enters or exits a space on or adjacent to the mine, they must save. On a failed save, the mine explodes for [fray] damage in a blast 1 area effect, shoving all affected characters 3, and inflicts burning. Burning foes are vulnerable.

Actions.Name: Mortar
Actions.Description: The Weapon chooses a character in range 6. At the end of that character's next turn, they explode for a blast 1 area effect centered on them, dealing [fray] damage to all characters and shoving all characters 1 space away from the target.

Actions.Name: Broadside
Actions.Description: All foes in range 6 of the Weapon must save. On a successful save, they are shoved 1. On a failed save, they are shattered and shoved 3.

Actions.Name: Rotary Cannon
Actions.Description: The Azurian weapon chooses a foe in range 8, then summons a targeting reticle 3 spaces from them. The weapon can have up to 3 targeting reticles, and can target a given character more than once with a reticle. Using this ability again with 3 reticles active resummons a reticle.

Summons.Name: Targeting Reticle
Summons.Effects: The reticle can share space with other characters. It moves 1 space towards the chosen character at the start of that character's turn, then 1 space whenever they take an action. When the reticle enters any character's space, the Weapon deals [D] piercing damage to that character a number of times equal to the round number +1.

PhasesDescription: The Azurian Weapon enters Phase II when bloodied.

Phases.Description:
As phase I, but in Phase II:
• Submerge becomes 2/round.
• Arkentech Artillery does not end on a quadrant of the map once that quadrant is chosen (meaning it will eventually cover the whole map).
• Rotary Cannon has no maximum number of targeting reticles.
